channel.title: CVE Feed for UkrSolution -- Simple Inventory Management – just scan barcode to manage products and orders. For WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for UkrSolution -- Simple Inventory Management – just scan barcode to manage products and orders. For WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2023-52215|2024-08-02T22:55:41.590Z -- ukrsolution -- simple%20inventory%20management%20%E2%80%93%20just%20scan%20barcode%20to%20manage%20products%20and%20orders.%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in UkrSolution Simple Inventory Management – just scan barcode to manage products and orders. For WooCommerce.This issue affects Simple Inventory Management – just scan barcode to manage products and orders. For WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.5.1.
